verses.verse: Sing <S%H7891><s%> to Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> a new <S%H2319><s%> song! <S%H7892><s%> Sing <S%H7891><s%> to Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> all the earth. <S%H776><s%>
Sing <S%H7891><s%> to Yahweh! <S%H3068><s%> Bless <S%H1288><s%> his name! <S%H8034><s%> Proclaim <S%H1319><s%> his salvation <S%H3444><s%> from day <S%H3117><s%> to day! <S%H3117><s%>
Declare <S%H5608><s%> his glory <S%H3519><s%> among the nations, <S%H1471><s%> his marvelous <S%H6381><s%> works among all the peoples. <S%H5971><s%>
For great <S%H1419><s%> is Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> and greatly <S%H3966><s%> to be praised! <S%H1984><s%> He is to be feared <S%H3372><s%> above all gods. <S%H430><s%>
For all the gods <S%H430><s%> of the peoples <S%H5971><s%> are idols, <S%H457><s%> but Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> the heavens. <S%H8064><s%>
Honor <S%H1935><s%> and majesty <S%H1926><s%> are before <S%H6440><s%> him. <S%H5797><s%> Strength and beauty <S%H8597><s%> are in his sanctuary. <S%H4720><s%>
Ascribe <S%H3051><s%> to Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> you families <S%H4940><s%> of nations, <S%H5971><s%> ascribe <S%H3051><s%> to Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> glory <S%H3519><s%> and strength. <S%H5797><s%>

Ascribe <S%H3051><s%> to Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> the glory <S%H3519><s%> due to his name. <S%H8034><s%> Bring <S%H5375><s%> an offering, <S%H4503><s%> and come <S%H935><s%> into his courts. <S%H2691><s%>
Worship <S%H7812><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> in holy <S%H6944><s%> array. <S%H1927><s%> Tremble <S%H2342><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> him, <S%H776><s%> all the earth.

Say <S%H559><s%> among the nations, <S%H1471><s%> "Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> reigns. <S%H4427><s%>" The world <S%H8398><s%> is also established. <S%H3559><s%> It can't <S%H4131><s%> be moved. He will judge <S%H1777><s%> the peoples <S%H5971><s%> with equity. <S%H4339><s%>
Let the heavens <S%H8064><s%> be glad, <S%H1523><s%> and let the earth <S%H776><s%> rejoice. <S%H8055><s%> Let the sea <S%H3220><s%> roar, <S%H7481><s%> and its fullness! <S%H4393><s%>
Let the field <S%H7704><s%> and all that is in it exult! <S%H5937><s%> Then all the trees <S%H6086><s%> of the woods <S%H3293><s%> shall sing for joy <S%H7442><s%>

before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh; <S%H3068><s%> for he comes, <S%H935><s%> for he comes <S%H935><s%> to judge <S%H8199><s%> the earth. <S%H776><s%> He will judge <S%H8199><s%> the world <S%H8398><s%> with righteousness, <S%H6664><s%> the peoples <S%H5971><s%> with his truth. <S%H530><s%>
